InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S3 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 3

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weapon’s fire. VariPucks will accept any weapon one size smaller than the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-442 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 4
Missiles: 4xS2

Behring’s MSD-442 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 4 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of four S2 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Aspis
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Basilisk 
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

Basilisk’s Aspis industrial shield generator features durable design and reliable performance, earning it a place on Whitley’s Guide ‘Best Buy’ list.

InstalledItem.Name: TurboDrive
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: A&R
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Military

The TurboDrive is a common military-grade power plant from A&R that slightly favors performance over durability and stealth.

InstalledItem.Name: Graupel
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Wen/Cassel Propulsion
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

The Graupel not only provides the top of the line cooling technology that larger ships need to maintain optimal performance, it does it with Wen/Cassel’s signature craftsmanship.

InstalledItem.Name: Graupel
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Wen/Cassel Propulsion

InstalledItem.Name: Bolon
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk 
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

Don’t let lesser craftsmanship put you and your precious cargo at risk. The Bolon industrial quantum drive was built with durability in mind to keep it working when you need it most.

InstalledItem.Name: Burke QD
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Wei-Tek
Type: Quantum Dampener
Size: 1
Grade: A
Class: Military

See that justice is served with the Burke QD. This powerful quantum dampener from Wei-Tek projects a massive field that keeps ships from engaging their quantum drives, making it a valuable component for both law enforcement and security professionals.

InstalledItem.Name: Surveyor
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: Chimera Communications
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

The Surveyor radar from Chimera Communications does away with all the unnecessary extras other manufacturers hide behind to focus on what matters: signature and emission detection that works the way you need it to.
